column2: Smoque was just another place in a long disappointing line that proves that Northside restaurateurs should just put away the sauce
column3: turn off the smoker and travel a few miles to the South side to learn something about the food they are mocking with their below par efforts.  If they don't want to go to the South side
column4: then maybe a weekend trip to Jim and Nicks in Birmingham
column6: Gates in Kansas or the guy with the BBQ grill in the post office parking lot in Waterloo
column7: Iowa may help out.  These ribs are all different
column8: but they are all good.  Just please
column9: I beg of you...go learn something so I can get good ribs close to home!!!
